name: Rothchildes
additionalNotes: The Illusione Rothchilde is a cigar for the medium to full bodied smoker. They are artfully made at the TABSAS factory in Esteli, Nicaragua. The cigar features a beautiful rich, dark, toothy San Andreas maduro wrapper. Inside this beautiful wrapper is Nicaraguan Cuban-seed long-filler and binder which are mostly from the lush Aganorsa farms. The Illusione Rothchilds a rothchild in size measuring 4 1/2" with a 50 ring gauge. This tasty cigar will tease your tastebuds with rich, complex flavors of cocoa, earth, wood, spice and a creaminess in the flavor .
